function.description:
This construct provides a convenient way to perform a query-by-example that results in a single row. It is equivalent to executing:
SELECT TOP 1 * FROM [table] WHERE [key=value [key=value]]
The database parameter is optional. The last made connection will be used if no database is given. This function returns a new object with all its values.
__NOTE__: Fields with `null` values are ignored in the search of objects.
